meanings.definition: A person who adds color to something.
meanings.sent1: The colourers painted the walls of the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The colourers used bright hues to decorate the party venue.
meanings.sent3: The colourers accidentally spilled paint on themselves and turned into walking rainbows.
meanings.sent4: The colourers transformed the dull room into a vibrant masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The colourers skillfully blended different shades to create a beautiful mural.

meanings.definition: Those who give a false appearance to something.
meanings.sent1: The colourers of the counterfeit money were caught by the police.
meanings.sent2: The colourers of the fake documents were skilled at deception.
meanings.sent3: The colourers tried to pass off their low-quality products as luxury items.
meanings.sent4: The colourers of lies wove a web of deceit around the truth.
meanings.sent5: The colourers of illusions created a mirage of success.
